name: The Artsmanship of Mark Rothko
description:
Through a generous donation from a mysterious benefactor, the Mark Rothko Art Gallery is open for business! There's plenty to learn here. Take a good look at the art, but please do not touch. Please do not touch. Take a good look at the art, but please do not touch. Take a good look. Please do not look. Please do not touch. Please do not learn. Please do not stab the art. Through a generous donation from a mysterious benefactor, the Mark Rothko Art Gallery is open for business!

Made by Caelan Pollock and Kenjiro Goodson: https://thenewfairybook.itch.io
